text: Ust, ki hamai sumoro az jak tan ʙiefarid. Va az on jak tan zanasro niz ʙijofarid to ʙa u oromis joʙad. Cun ʙo u jakcoja sud, ʙa ʙore eaʙuk homila sud va muddate ʙo on guzarond. Va cun ʙor sangin gardid, on du Olloh Parvardigori xudro ʙixondand, ki agar moro farzande soleh dihi, az svposguzoron xohem ʙud
